definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
not to be crushed (idiom)/to be determined to have one's revenge
pinyin: bu4 zheng1 man2 tou5 zheng1 kou3 qi4

definition: to take advantage of others' misfortune (idiom)

sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎馒头是游客在上海旅行必尝的食品。

sentences.english: Elaborated in the industrialization production the steamed bun anti-aging engineering research present situation.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了工业化生产中馒头抗老化技术研究现状。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠对面团粉质特性和馒头品质的影响。

sentences.english: We just eat noodles or buns.
That is the process of converting thoughts into bread.
sentences.chinese: 这就是思想转变成馒头的过程。

sentences.english: The four of them had soon polished off all the food and wine.
sentences.chinese: 四人过不多时，便将酒肉馒头吃得干干净净。

sentences.english: Instead, the online materials appear to be only whetting appetites for more.
sentences.chinese: 反之，似乎是唯一的网上资料更助长馒头。

sentences.english: And people there take the newly harvested wheat and make pancakes and steamed buns.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人们会用刚刚收获的小麦制作烙饼和馒头。

sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎馒头是游客在上海旅行必尝的食品。

sentences.english: Fewer steamed buns were for sale at this Lianhua supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 在联华超市出售较少馒头。

sentences.english: Low ash content and high whiteness are required both for NSB and DWCN.
sentences.chinese: 馒头和面条还要求低灰分和较高的白度。

sentences.english: The next day, Mei Ling cleaned the shop and made a lot of mantou to sell in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，美玲打扫了店铺并且做了很多馒头在店里卖。

sentences.english: The two-time-fermentation was applied to produce bread.
sentences.chinese: 通过二次发酵法研究蒸烤馒头的生产工艺。

sentences.english: It sets the stage and whets the appetites of your visitors .
sentences.chinese: 它集舞台以致你的馒头参观者。
这些祭品就叫做“人头馒头”。

definition: steamed bun stuffed with vegetables/(fig.) useless person/a good-for-nothing
